column1: Little Goat Diner////I'm fan of Bloody Mary's
column2: especially on a Sunday morning. However
column3: I am also a big fan of a Moscow Mule. When I saw a Moscow Goat on their cocktail menu
column4: I knew it was meant to be. Their Moscow Goat is Bombay Dry Gin
column5: Ginger Beer and Grapefruit with lime garnish. Oh
column6: so refreshing. If only we could start every morning with one of these.
